    "content": "This file is automatically generated. Please don't edit it manually.

name: BasePlayerGui
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  The BasePlayerGui is an abstract class which the GUI drawing storage classes
  inherit from.
description: |
  The BasePlayerGui is an abstract class that all GUI drawing storage classes
  inherit from.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - Instance
descendants:
  - CoreGui
  - PlayerGui
  - StarterGui
tags:
  - NotCreatable
deprecationmessage: ''
properties: []
methods:
  - name: BasePlayerGui:GetGuiObjectsAtPosition
    summary: |
      Returns a list of all Class.GuiObject instances occupying the given
      point on the screen.
    description: |
      Takes a screen position and returns a list of all the Class.GuiObject
      instances that are occupying that screen position, sorted in the order
      they appear on-screen from top to bottom as the first and last index,
      respectively.

      The main use case is to get GUI objects under the player's mouse or touch
      inputs to do things like allow selection or highlighting. These effects
      can already be achieved using Class.GuiObject.MouseEnter and
      Class.GuiObject.MouseLeave but this requires the developer to track
      these events for their UI objects all the time even if they only need this
      functionality in specific circumstances.

      Since the child classes of Class.BasePlayerGui inherit this function, it
      can be fired by class objects such as the Class.PlayerGui and
      Class.StarterGui folders.
    codesamples:
      - selecting-guis-at-a-position
    parameters:
      - name: x
        type: int
        default:
        summary: |
          The x position on the screen relative to the top left corner after the
          Class.GuiService:GetGuiInset()|GuiInset is applied.
      - name: 'y'
        type: int
        default:
        summary: |
          The y position on the screen relative to the top left corner after the
          Class.GuiService:GetGuiInset()|GuiInset is applied.
    returns:
      - type: Instances
        summary: |
          A table of the Class.GuiObject instances that occupy the given
          screen space.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    threadsafety: Unsafe
    capabilities:
      - UI
events: []
callbacks: []",
    "source": "BasePlayerGui.yaml"
}
